attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
dear mr prime minister,
i have been a labour voter for more than 30 years. until recentil recently my pensions have been proportional to the cost of living. but now i have just recived my latest pension slip from lloyds bank, and after a 3.9% rise .i am worse of?by about 6 pounds  week? i am also on benifits and a carer
for my mother. i do hope you can sort this problem out, as i do not want to vote tory. many thanks terry stainer.
ps
keep up the good work.

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
